document.title: Showing or hiding links and labels

list.item:
To toggle visibility of all client links, click Show/hide client-supplier links.
/images/eiffelstudio/icons/icon_supplier_color.gif

To toggle visibility of all inheritance links, click Show/hide inheritance links.
/images/eiffelstudio/icons/icon_inherit_color.gif

To toggle visibility of all client link labels, click Show/hide client-supplier links.
/images/eiffelstudio/icons/icon_display_labels_color.gif
